tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: I took Dr. Bacon for two PSYCH courses during my time at DCTC, and I am so thankful that I had her. She incorporates a lot of interesting videos and materials into each unit, which makes her classes unique and enjoyable. An outstanding instructor - organized, professional, timely, and a truly gifted teacher. My favorite instructor at this college.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Great instructor. She has rules about tardiness, so don\'t plan on coming late to class. Very professional, organized, and grades assignments quickly. I learned a lot in her class, and would highly recommend her.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)
comments: She was a good teacher. Her lectures can get a little dry sometimes, but I think that was mostly due to me taking a 3 hour night class, once a week. I could see how some people would rate her as "not easy", because she expects you to be accountable for your actions. I see that as responsibility, some see it as being mean.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (1)
comments: It was a tough class for me but Dr. Bacon was great. Always willing to help.
